content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am interested to hear what rental price you have in mind. Remember, my goal is to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds good. I would like to rent your apartment for 500 euros per month. I am a dependable and responsible person and I will take good care of your apartment. What do you think?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I think 500 euros is a fair price, but considering the prime location of my apartment, I believe we can push the price higher. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to pay 550 euros per month for the apartment. I am a student and I can show you the financial proof. I can also sign a two-year contract. What do you say?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While 550 euros is a significant amount, I believe that the prime location and amenities of my apartment are worth more. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a smart person and I always research the market value of apartments. I can tell you that the average price for a one-bedroom apartment in Munich is around 700 euros. I am willing to pay 600 euros per month for your apartment. I believe this is a fair price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While your research is commendable, I must disagree with your assessment of the market value of my apartment. Considering its prime location and amenities, I believe it is worth more than the average price. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to pay 650 euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the location and amenities. I am a dependable and responsible person, and I will take good care of your apartment. What do you say?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While 650 euros is a considerable amount, I believe that the prime location and amenities of my apartment are worth more. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 675 euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the location and amenities. I am a smart person and I always research the market value of apartments. I can show you the financial proof. I can also sign a two-year contract. What do you say?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While 675 euros is a significant amount, I believe that the prime location and amenities of my apartment are worth more. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to pay 700 euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the location and amenities. I am a dependable and responsible person, and I will take good care of your apartment. What do you say?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros! Let's proceed with the rental agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
